listAchievement.name: Take Off
listAchievement.description: Shot the Cue ball off the table

listAchievement.name: Triple kick
listAchievement.description: Poket a ball after the cue ball hit the cushion <size=30><color=#FFFF00>3</color></size> times

listAchievement.name: Nice Kicker
listAchievement.description: Pocket a ball without the Cue ball touching it

listAchievement.name: The Alpha Strike
listAchievement.description: Pocket <size=30><color=#FFFF00>3</color></size> ball in one stroke

listAchievement.name: Calculated
listAchievement.description: Pocket a moving ball

listAchievement.name: Shhhhh, we're in a library
listAchievement.description: Mute the SFX in the game

listAchievement.name: That's not a button
listAchievement.description: Tap the lobby screen <size=30><color=#FFFF00>10</color></size> times in a row

listAchievement.name: The Mall or the Lottery
listAchievement.description: Use the shop the first time

listAchievement.name: Shredder
listAchievement.description: Use disenchant the first time

listAchievement.name: Novice Blacksmith
listAchievement.description: Upgrade the first time

listAchievement.name: One for you and one for me
listAchievement.description: Pocket a Striped  and a Solid ball in one stroke

listAchievement.name: This table is mine
listAchievement.description: Pocket a total of <size=30><color=#FFFF00>10</color></size> balls in a game

listAchievement.name: Ace in the hole
listAchievement.description: Pocket the <size=30><color=#FFFF00>8</color></size> ball during the break cue

listAchievement.name: One two three four one two three four …
listAchievement.description: Win a match by pocketing ball with number ascending (except the 8 ball)
